title: The #$@!# Bicycle Boys Save Christmas, Again!
description: “Santa Claus has been kidnapped!” exclaimed the President of the United States. “This is a crisis only The #$@!# Bicycle Boys can handle!” In this stand-alone tale from Alex Bernstein's "Miserable Holiday Stories", Flip and Chip, the celebrated Bicycle Boys (junior detectives) return with their wildest adventure yet. Will they fall into the clutches of Ricky the Rogue Elf, Count Oobleck, or the nefarious Crooked Man? Will they discover what happened to the world's missing cash? Could they possibly stop cursing? And most importantly, will they ever get their bikes fixed!? Find out in the “fake” Chapter Book that Amazon readers are calling, “hilariously funny!”
author: Alex Bernstein
